section.title: Introduction
section.para: OpenStack Compute supports the VMware ESX hypervisor. This section describes the additional configuration required to launch VMWare-based virtual machine images.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: You will need to install the following software:

listitem.para: python-suds: This software is needed by the nova-compute service. If not installed, the "nova-compute" service shuts down with the message: "Unable to import suds".

section.title: Configure Tomcat to serve WSDL files
section.para: Download the WSDLs from http://www.vmware.com/support/developer/vc-sdk/ and copy the wsdl folder into /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps.

section.title: VMWare configuration options
section.para: Configure nova.conf with the following VMWare-specific config options:
section.programlisting: vmwareapi_host_ip=<ESX hypervisor machine IP> vmwareapi_host_username=< ESX hypervisor username> vmwareapi_host_password=< ESX hypervisor password> vmwareapi_wsdl_loc=http://127.0.0.1:8080/wsdl/vim25/vimService.wsdl
